title: North Esports Recruitment Challenge! - We are looking for PLAYERS!

embed.description: North Esports is very proud to present our very first RECRUITMENT CHALLENGE! Thankyou all for the support you have given us since we launched 3 days ago and we look forward to the response!

body:
Forgot to put our twitter for all you tweeters out there - hit up the video attached for details. North Esports is Australia's NEWEST Esports organisation that wants to reach the top. If you're a solid player and want to get a spot in our roster visit our video and twitter for more info:

Recruitment video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JN5e5Esdbx4
Official Twitter - https://www.twitter.com/northesportsne
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/northesportsne

Looking forward to hearing from you all!

North Decos - Manager of North Esports
